content: Carpooling App

A mobile app that connects people who live in the same area and commute to work together. Users can share the cost of gas, parking, and tolls. The app uses an algorithm to match compatible riders and drivers based on their location and schedule.
Real-time matching, In-app payment, Flexible schedule, User rating system, GPS tracking
Uber Pool, Lyft Line, BlaBlaCar, Waze Carpool, Scoop
Only focuses on daily commute, Lower cost compared to ride-sharing services, Social aspect of meeting new people
Telecommuting Consulting

Remote work consulting service that helps businesses and employees transition from office work to telecommuting. The service provides a customized plan for each client based on their industry, job function, and communication needs. The plan includes training, tools, and best practices for remote work.
Remote work assessment, Customized plan, Training, Tools, Best practices
Remote.co, FlexJobs, Working Nomads, We Work Remotely, Virtual Vocations
Focuses on businesses and employees, Tailored plan for specific needs, Wide range of services
Electric Bike Rental

Electric bikes rental service that offers an affordable and eco-friendly alternative to commuting by car. The service operates in urban areas and provides bikes that can reach a speed of up to 28 mph. The bikes come with a battery that can be easily swapped or charged at any charging station.
Affordable pricing, Environmentally friendly, High-speed bike, Easy battery swap, Wide network of charging stations
Lime, Bird, Jump, Uber Bike, Ofo
Faster and more efficient than traditional bikes, Easier to use than electric scooters, No need to own a bike
Gas Discount Card

A membership card that offers discounts on gas purchases at participating stations. Members can save up to 25% on their gas expenses. The card can be used at any gas station in the country, and there are no restrictions on the amount of gas that can be purchased.
Wide network of participating stations, High discount rate, No purchase restrictions, Easy to use, Automatic refill option
GasBuddy, AAA, Shell Fuel Rewards, ExxonMobil Rewards+, BPme Rewards
No need to change gas station habits, Higher discount rate compared to competitors, Automatic refill option
pain_point_description: commuters who drive their own cars to work have to deal with high gas prices that eat into their overall budget. this can be especially hard for those with fixed incomes
